Mani's Dum Biryani.name: Chicken 65
Mani's Dum Biryani.description: A spicy and tangy South Indian appetizer featuring bite-sized pieces of chicken marinated in a blend of yogurt, chili, and spices. Fried to golden perfection, these crispy morsels are bursting with flavor and served with a side of cooling raita or a squeeze of lemon. Perfect as a starter or snack.

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.Comment: Absolutely delicious! The flavors are amazing.

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.Comment: Very tasty but a bit too spicy for me.

Mani's Dum Biryani.name: Fish Kabab
Mani's Dum Biryani.description: Succulent pieces of fish marinated in a blend of aromatic spices and herbs, then grilled to perfection. These kebabs are smoky, tender, and packed with flavor, making them an irresistible appetizer or side dish. Served with a wedge of lemon and a sprinkle of fresh herbs for added zest.

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.Comment: Absolutely delicious! The flavors are amazing.

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.Comment: Very tasty but a bit too spicy for me.

Empire restaurant.name: Tandoori Chicken
Empire restaurant.description: Tandoori Chicken is a popular Indian dish known for its vibrant color and smoky, spicy flavor. Traditionally cooked in a tandoor (a cylindrical clay oven), it can also be made in a regular oven or on a grill. Here's a detailed recipe for making delicious Tandoori Chicken at home.

reviews.name: Jill Grey
reviews.Comment: Really good, but could use more marinade.
